summary: The contact owns a 2019 Jeep Cherokee. The contact stated that after the vehicle had an oil changed performed by an independent mechanic, the contact noticed that there was oil leaking onto the ground. The vehicle was taken back to the independent mechanic and diagnosed as a transmission leakage. The vehicle was then taken to the dealer and diagnosed with a cracked oil filter adapter from the oil change by the independent mechanic. The vehicle was repaired. The manufacturer was not made aware of the failure. The failure mileage was 24,397.
